personalInfo.name: Li-Chen Cheng
personalInfo.bio: I am currently pursuing a Ph.D. degree in computer science at University of California, Irvine. I received my bachelor's and master's degrees in computer science from National Taiwan University. My research interests include trustworthy AI, machine learning, and its applications in computer vision and natural language processing.
